ionicConductivity.description: a function to determine the ionic conductivity of the electrolyte under given conditions

diffusionCoefficient.description: a function to determine the diffusion coefficient of a molecule in the electrolyte under given conditions

compnames.description: List of the ions contained in the electrolyte. For the moment, we support only binary electrolyte so that this data is in practice only used directly in the code

species.description: Property for the positive ion (Lithium). In case of non-binary electrolyte, it would require adjustment.

nominalConcentration.description: nominal concentration used as initial concentration in a simulation

density.description: the mass density of the material

bruggemanCoefficient.description: the coefficient for determining effective transport parameters in porous media
